statements: SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, quantity FROM trade_execution_records WHERE price > 100
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE trade_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trade_execution_records WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, execution_timestamp FROM trade_execution_records WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY quantity DESC, execution_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, quantity, price, execution_timestamp FROM trade_execution_records WHERE execution_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, executed_by, security_symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records;
SELECT trade_date, security_symbol, price, trade_id, executed_by, quantity FROM trade_execution_records;
SELECT executed_by, quantity, security_symbol FROM trade_execution_records;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records;
SELECT trade_id, executed_by, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT security_symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM trade_execution_records GROUP BY security_symbol HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT executed_by, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE quantity > 100 GROUP BY executed_by HAVING avg_price > 500 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, security_symbol FROM trade_execution_records WHERE executed_by LIKE '%John%' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_executions ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_price > 100;
SELECT trader_name, trader_email FROM traders WHERE trader_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, trade_price FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_id DESC;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY trade_timestamp;
SELECT traders.trader_name, traders.trader_email, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM traders JOIN trade_executions ON traders.trader_id = trade_executions.trade_id WHERE trade_quantity < 50;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_executions WHERE trade_symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' OR trade_symbol LIKE 'MSFT%' ORDER BY trade_symbol, trade_quantity DESC;

SELECT traders.trader_name, trade_symbol, trade_price, reason FROM traders JOIN trade_executions ON traders.trader_id = trade_executions.trade_id JOIN compliance_records ON trade_executions.trade_id = compliance_records.trade_id WHERE compliant = TRUE ORDER BY traders.trader_name, trade_symbol;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records ORDER BY execution_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_execution_records WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT execution_date, quantity FROM trade_execution_records WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trader_name, hire_date FROM trader_info WHERE department_id = 101 ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, rule, status FROM compliance_records WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM trade_execution_records WHERE execution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY execution_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT trader_name, hire_date FROM trader_info WHERE department_id = 3 ORDER BY trader_name;
SELECT trade_id, rule, status FROM compliance_records WHERE rule LIKE '%KYC%' AND status = 'Pending' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_date, description FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_date, symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, quantity, price, executed_by FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trader_id, first_name, last_name, region FROM traders WHERE region = 'US' ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT execution_id, trade_id, trader_id, counterparty_id, execution_date FROM trade_executions WHERE executed_price > 100 ORDER BY executed_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, quantity, price, executed_by FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM traders WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT name, city, country FROM counterparties WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT trade_id, execution_date, executed_quantity, executed_price FROM trade_executions WHERE execution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id, details FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'UPDATED' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
